title: #179 - Pitching & PR with Brigitte Lyons
description:
Let's talk about pitching and PR—because it's so important for your business, but you need to make sure you're doing it right! We've got our PR rep, Brigitte Lyons, on the show today to talk about setting up your business for PR, pitching best practices, and some insider tips on how to craft the perfect pitch to get some awesome exposure for your business.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting & Twenty20
